title: Separate dining area, Wood-style plank flooring, Onsite playground
posting_body: ['South of Las Vegas, in picturesque Henderson, The Bristol at Sunset is everything you could ever want in an apartment community.', 'With proximity to everything from the nature preserves to the excitement, shopping, and entertainment of nearby casinos – when you live here, your most difficult decision will be how to spend your weekends.', '-Resident social lounge', '-Two-tone paint scheme Select units', '-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:', 'Only a small one-time payment', '-Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements', '-Complimentary Wi-Fi in common areas', '-Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance', '-Fenced dog park with pet watering station', '-Exterior storage available', '-Package locker with 24/7 access to packages', '-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity', '-Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', '-Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Prices Change Daily', 'Flexible Lease Terms']
